testcases=int(input())
for i in range(testcases):
    s=input()
    x=s.find("abc")
    while(x!=-1):
        s=s.replace("abc", "")
        x=s.find("abc")
    print(s)

# cook your dish here
for i in range(int(input())):
    n=input()
    co=n.count('abc')
    while(co!=0):
        n=n.replace('abc','')
        co=n.count('abc')
    print(n)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    string=str(input())
    target="abc"
    while(target in string):
        start=string.find(target)
        string=string[:start]+string[start+3:]

    print(string)

    while 'abc' in s:
